item.title: Who Not How - Book Review
item.description: I got introduced to this book via listening to different podcasts. I can’t remember now which specific podcasts but they were quite a few and the book has always been highly rated by those who mentioned it. And, so it got me curious and here’s my review of the book, “Who Not How” by Dan Sullivan and Dr. Benjamin Hardy. 1. What is the book all about The main promises of the book are:
